price: 84. Sur eux Nous fîmes tomber une pluie (de pierres d’argile). Vois donc quel fut le sort des criminels.
arabic: وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم مَّطَرٗاۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-amṭarnā ʿalayhim maṭaran fa-unẓur kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-muj'rimīna
